item.title: Numbers 1
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses in the wilderness of Sinai, in the Tent of Meeting, on the first day of the second month, in the second year after they had come out of the land of Egypt, saying,

item.title: Numbers 2
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying, v2 “The children of Israel shall encamp every man by his own standard, with the banners of their fathers’ houses.

item.title: Numbers 3
item.description: v1 Now this is the history of the generations of Aaron and Moses in the day that Yahweh spoke with Moses in Mount Sinai.

item.title: Numbers 4
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying, v2 “Take a census of the sons of Kohath from among the sons of Levi, by their families, by their fathers’ houses,

item.title: Numbers 5
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Command the children of Israel that they put out of the camp every leper, everyone who has a discharge, and whoever is unclean by a corpse.

item.title: Numbers 6
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Speak to the children of Israel, and tell them: ‘When either man or woman shall make a special vow, the vow of a Nazirite, to separate himself to Yahweh,

item.title: Numbers 7
item.description: v1 On the day that Moses had finished setting up the tabernacle, and had anointed it and sanctified it with all its furniture, and the altar with all its vessels, and had anointed and sanctified them;

item.title: Numbers 8
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Speak to Aaron, and tell him, ‘When you light the lamps, the seven lamps shall give light in front of the lamp stand.

item.title: Numbers 9
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses in the wilderness of Sinai, in the first month of the second year after they had come out of the land of Egypt, saying,

item.title: Numbers 10
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Make two trumpets of silver.

item.title: Numbers 11
item.description: v1 The people were complaining in the ears of Yahweh. When Yahweh heard it, his anger burned; and Yahweh’s fire burned among them, and consumed some of the outskirts of the camp.

item.title: Numbers 12
item.description: v1 Miriam and Aaron spoke against Moses because of the Cushite woman whom he had married; for he had married a Cushite woman.

item.title: Numbers 13
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Send men, that they may spy out the land of Canaan, which I give to the children of Israel.

item.title: Numbers 14
item.description: v1 All the congregation lifted up their voice, and cried; and the people wept that night.

item.title: Numbers 15
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Speak to the children of Israel, and tell them, ‘When you have come into the land of your habitations, which I give to you,

item.title: Numbers 16
item.description: v1 Now Korah, the son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, with Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab, and On, the son of Peleth, sons of Reuben, took some men.

item.title: Numbers 17
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Speak to the children of Israel, and take rods from them, one for each fathers’ house, of all their princes according to their fathers’ houses, twelve rods.

item.title: Numbers 18
item.description: v1 Yahweh said to Aaron, “You and your sons and your fathers’ house with you shall bear the iniquity of the sanctuary; and you and your sons with you shall bear the iniquity of your priesthood.

item.title: Numbers 19
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying, v2 “This is the statute of the law which Yahweh has commanded.

item.title: Numbers 20
item.description: v1 The children of Israel, even the whole congregation, came into the wilderness of Zin in the first month.

item.title: Numbers 21
item.description: v1 The Canaanite, the king of Arad, who lived in the South, heard that Israel came by the way of Atharim.

item.title: Numbers 22
item.description: v1 The children of Israel traveled, and encamped in the plains of Moab beyond the Jordan at Jericho.

item.title: Numbers 23
item.description: v1 Balaam said to Balak, “Build here seven altars for me, and prepare here seven bulls and seven rams for me.

item.title: Numbers 24
item.description: v1 When Balaam saw that it pleased Yahweh to bless Israel, he didn’t go, as at the other times, to use divination, but he set his face toward the wilderness.

item.title: Numbers 25
item.description: v1 Israel stayed in Shittim; and the people began to play the prostitute with the daughters of Moab;

item.title: Numbers 26
item.description: v1 After the plague, Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest, saying,

item.title: Numbers 27
item.description: v1 Then the daughters of Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of Manasseh the son of Joseph came near.

item.title: Numbers 28
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Command the children of Israel, and tell them, ‘See that you present my offering, my food for my offerings made by fire, as a pleasant aroma to me, in their due season.

item.title: Numbers 29
item.description: v1 “‘In the seventh month, on the first day of the month, you shall have a holy convocation; you shall do no regular work.

item.title: Numbers 30
item.description: v1 Moses spoke to the heads of the tribes of the children of Israel, saying, “This is the thing which Yahweh has commanded.

item.title: Numbers 31
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Avenge the children of Israel on the Midianites.

item.title: Numbers 32
item.description: v1 Now the children of Reuben and the children of Gad had a very great multitude of livestock.

item.title: Numbers 33
item.description: v1 These are the journeys of the children of Israel, when they went out of the land of Egypt by their armies under the hand of Moses and Aaron.

item.title: Numbers 34
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying, v2 “Command the children of Israel, and tell them, ‘When you come into the land of Canaan (this is the land that shall fall to you for an inheritance, even the land of Canaan according to its borders),

item.title: Numbers 35
item.description: v1 Yahweh spoke to Moses in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho, saying,

item.title: Numbers 36
item.description: v1 The heads of the fathers’ households of the family of the children of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of the sons of Joseph, came near, and spoke before Moses and before the princes, the heads of the fathers’ households of the children of Israel.
